page.title: 13HOTELS IN SKEGNESS
page.content: There are lots of Hotels in Skegness.Most of them are small,family businesses.The number of bedrooms in a small Hotel is about 11.In the bigger Hotels there may be 25 or more.Most Hotels are situated in the Drummond Road area.There are also many bed and breakfast houses in this area. Recent tough new fire regulations which made the provision of fire escapes and extinguishers compulsory have made things difficult for hotel owners.Also the prices of holidays abroad have dropped,so that makes competition harder.Some residents have turned private houses into holiday flats,to make extra money.Many of the hotels are licensed,with bars.This makes the work more tireing.The average price paid for bed and breakfast is between Â£6.00 and Â£7.00.
